metadata.description: Comics superstar CHARLIE ADLARD has defined the look of the modern day horror comic with his work on THE WALKING DEAD. Now this art book delves into the full history of Charlie's amazing career, including an unprecedented look at the making of his 100th issue of THE WALKING DEAD.  Introduction by JONATHAN ROSS, as well as commentary by THE WALKING DEAD creator ROBERT KIRKMAN, SFX guru GREG NICOTERO and more!
metadata.name: The Art of Charlie Adlard
